sentences.sContent: You see this in the faces of tsunami and earthquake survivors on television.
sentences.sContent_eng: You see this in the faces of tsunami and earthquake survivors on television.
sentences.sCn: 你能从电视上海啸和地震的生还者的脸上看到这点。

sentences.sContent: They urged other town residents unaffected by the quake and tsunami to do the same.
sentences.sContent_eng: They urged other town residents unaffected by the quake and tsunami to do the same.
sentences.sCn: 他们敦促其他没有受到地震和海啸影响的城镇居民也这样做。

sentences.sContent: But I am lucky because we did get a little bit of the tsunami but nothing like what they got up north.
sentences.sContent_eng: But I am lucky because we did get a little bit of the tsunami but nothing like what they got up north.
sentences.sCn: 但我算是幸运的因为我们这只受到了海啸很小的侵害远不及北方所受到的那样。

trans.tranOther: a very large wave, caused by extreme conditions such as an  earthquake  , which can cause a lot of damage when it reaches land
